name: VIIU Card Game
description:
A playable relationship-building card game inspired by We're Not Really Strangers and informed by the Highly Sensitive Person's experience. To play, Duplicate this file and share a 'Can Edit' invite link with your crew. To flip and shuffle cards, install Game Table plugin from Figma community.


Everything is in 'beta' â€” have fun and please send any constructive feedback my way :)


See research & process: www.elisewang.design/work/viiu-relationship-builder-game
